Name: AV8B
Description:
A highly advanced VTOL attack aircraft produced through a joint effort between the United Kingdom and the United States.

In addition to increased performance and weapons carriage, the AV8B features a short-range radar.
Tactics:
The unique ability to vector thrust in flight allows for creative tactics during combat.

While the AV8B can carry a wide array of weapons, its limited hardpoints space means that loadouts will typically be specialized to a mission.
